text: The Wings of a Serf () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Yuri Tarich.В Доме кино пройдет выставка художника кино Владимира ЕгороваКРЫЛЬЯ ХОЛОПА It stars Leonid Leonidov, Ivan Klyukvin, and Safiyat Askarova. ==Actors== * Leonid Leonidov as Tsar Ivan the Terrible * Ivan Klyukvin as Nikita, serf-inventor * Safiyat Askarova as Tsar's wife Maria * Vladimir Korsh as Tsar's son Ivan * Nikolai Prozorovsky as Fedor Basmanov, courtier == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1926 drama movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 16th century
title: The Wings of a Serf
